section.p: Contains all the Coordinator SCI that provoded services for the veteran
Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] sciCoordinator with data type Code
Identifies the current and historic SCI Coordinator/s providing services for the veteran
Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran

Contains exactly one [1..1] isInSciNetwork with data type Boolean
Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently )
Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently )

Contains zero or more [0..*] sciCoordinator with data type Code
Identifies the current and historic SCI Coordinator/s providing services for the veteran
Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran

Contains exactly one [1..1] isInSciNetwork with data type Boolean
Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently )
Indicates whether the veteran is within an SCI Network (SCI networks across the country 22 currently )
